planner_payload.notes: Fix TS2531 by normalizing the select value before calling `includes`: derive `selected = Array.isArray(this.value) ? this.value : this.value != null ? [this.value] : []` and use it for filtering labels. Keep `onTouched` non-private. No API or template changes; retain existing modern styling and dark-mode behavior. Single-file change: `frontend/src/app/shared/ui/select/ui-select.ts`.
planner_payload.tests: 1) Build: `cd frontend && npm ci && npm run build` (or `ng build --configuration production`) 2) Unit tests: `npm test` to confirm Karma starts with 0 load errors 3) Manual: open pages with selects (Reports, Admin, Settings) and verify that labels render correctly for single/multi-select and there are no console errors. Dark mode still shows visible arrow (currentColor).
